omit.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it
omit.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Please don’t omit any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
Lisa’s name had been omitted from the list of honor students.
omit.translation[0].definitions[0].note_: In everyday English, people usually say leave out rather than omit:
Please don’t leave out any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
